channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins LDAP Email Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins LDAP Email Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10434|2024-08-04T22:24:18.039Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20ldap%20email%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins LDAP Email Plugin transmits configured credentials in plain text as part of the global Jenkins configuration form, potentially resulting in their exposure.
